# cook your code here
t = int(raw_input())
 
for i in range(t):
    n = int(raw_input())
    l1 = map(int, raw_input().split())
    l2 = map(int, raw_input().split())
    
    l1.sort(reverse = True)
    l2.sort(reverse = True)
    
    j = 0
    sum = 0
    
    for i in range(n):
        if(l1[i] <= l2[j]):
            sum += 1
            j += 1
    
    print sum
